page.title: 10SPORT IN GREAT EASTON
page.content: In Great Easton there are three places where sport is played.The playing field,school and the Village Hall.The playing field is used by children. There are swings,climbing frames and a slide.Girls or boys play football and other games.Great Easton has no football or cricket clubs.The Village hall is used for Judo,Carpet bowls and other social activities are held there. The only public swimming pool is the school pool and this is only used by the children at the school. Once a year the school has a Sports day where we have races of all kinds. The Infants and Juniors have separate races.The Juniors race for their house colour and the Infants run for fun. Every one has flat races but other races are optional.The scores are added up and the winners get a cup.
